website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice that's built to last and won't disappoint on performance.
pros: Wonderfully quiet and pulls air out nicely
cons: Relatively heavy and could be difficult to install

website_summaries.verdict: An extremely popular ventilation fan with a reputation for flawless, easy operation. The best on the market.
pros: A powerful air mover that is extremely quiet and can operate continuously
cons: Dimensions should be considered before purchase

customer_reviews.title: Installed 12/12/2018
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace an old undersized exhaust fan in my master bathroom. Mounting was very easy, I used the "New Installation" instructions as the drywall was off the ceiling. This is super quiet! The fan from the other bathroom can be heard over this one from below it. A word of caution, some builders do not install a vent at the other end. The exhaust simply runs over to the soffit. Looking on the inside this could easily lead to rot and other issues. So plan on adding a vent.
customer_reviews.author: Joe   L.

customer_reviews.title: Installation was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.text: This unit met our expectations for quietness and overall operation. We probably could have skipped the humidity sensor but it is extra protection from mold. Due to a long circuitous route for the vent hose we are using the highest fan setting. Having the adjustment for the speeds and run time are great to fine tune the operation. I like the way the unit soft starts and ramps up too. The motion detector is spot on. Would buy again. Installation of the unit wasn't too bad for us but adding the vent hose took a few hours to fish through by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Wise reader

customer_reviews.title: OMG  Quiet as a church mouse
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, super quiet at 110 cfm. The built-in features allow you to customize the timing for the Motion Detector as well as the Humidity Sensor. Install could be easier but two of us working together had it fully completed in 90 mins and that included running electric to a new wall switch and to the fan. Of course you don’t really need an on/off switch, but I prefer to have one.
customer_reviews.author: forepaughs

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: I place this over my master shower. The popcorn ceiling was dropping. I redid the ceiling and added this. It keeps all steam out of the bathroom. I kind of wish I got one with a light though. But this does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Best exhaust I have never heard
customer_reviews.text: Night and day difference comparatively to competitive products. Near soundless action and moves huge volumes of air. Bathroom fog no more. Will buy 2 more for our other bathrooms. Next purchase will include the motion detecting light. Very impressed with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: adeshong

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this fan. Took a risk and purchased online when the fan we had picked out (with light) was on back order. It arrived quickly and well packaged. I'm glad we went with this option as it is even quieter than the one we originally picked. You can BARELY hear it. We leave it on and it takes care of itself. Motion sensor and moisture detection are excellent. The fan is exceptionally quiet. Buy this if you are thinking about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate bathroom fan!
customer_reviews.text: The motion sensor control is awesome! Fully automatic. The fan is excellent quality and quiet. Works with 4 or 6 inch duct.
customer_reviews.author: James D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fan for our master bathroom. Ultra quiet and automatically ramps up when humidity increases. Not the cheapest, but you will not be disappointed. Moves a great deal of air when needed.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: VERY QUITE
customer_reviews.text: quite adjustable motion sensor if you leave it on will shut off automatically walk back in back on Great !
customer_reviews.author: mark schwiebert

customer_reviews.title: it works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the number six vents that I brought. It took about one hours to put in since I have no experience with the installation. The manual is very clear how to install it. The old one dead and too expensive to replace the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IMHO the best on the market !
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Panasonic Whisper Sense (with motion and humidly sensors) I've installed in my home. Would never settle for anything less ! Wish they had a 130 CFM option for larger bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Goldfinch

customer_reviews.title: Superior - The Ultimate Bathroom exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Good CFM. Beautiful. This is my second purchase. I was very pleased with this Panasonic fan. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JAHMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bathroom fan
customer_reviews.text: Installed in bathroom where condensation use to run down the walls after showers. This fan clears humidity before it builds and does so quietly. Due to the motion and humidity sensors, no one has to turn on or off the fan. Could not be more pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: MN Mom

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for those who forget to turn off the fan or want the fan to come on automatically when shower humidity needs taken out.
customer_reviews.author: Rod C.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet exhaust fan. Have to crawl around attic to install. Wiring instructions are questionable.
customer_reviews.author: BBuhler

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: The motion sensor works great but the relative humidity or other sensors keep the fan on until you turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: chris godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love these fans as they act as the whole house fan.
customer_reviews.author: D R

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at 80 cfm. I can barely hear it. Plus no fog on my vanity mirror any more.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Performance
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace a fan during a bathroom reno and did a ton of research and this model kept coming up as one of the best solutions, but the price seemed a bit steep. Worth every penny. installation was easy, it moves air 20x better than the old one I replaced and 1/4 as loud.
customer_reviews.author: Derek E.

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality item that out last its competition
customer_reviews.text: This item is a quality item that should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fans. I changed all the fans in my home. Super quiet! I love the motion and humidity sensors. Makes it so it works when’s it’s needed unlike other fans. Perfect for children in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Max S

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet unit.
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade from the one that came with the house. Quieter than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Totalzen Family

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bathroom fan. It is smart enough to turn on when someone walks into the room. I am most pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Quiet very quiet once installed our contractor almost took it down because he didn't think it was working until he saw the bolt spinning.
customer_reviews.author: justin dodson

customer_reviews.title: Can be set up as a fully automatic unit operation
customer_reviews.text: Unit is fully automatic with user setting for humidity “on” level, and timer “off” delay. Works great, no noise. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cunard

customer_reviews.title: Super dooper quiet
customer_reviews.text: They need a light to tell you that its even on!!
customer_reviews.author: Jet Kohli

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and works really well so I purchased a second one for our other bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Kjb

customer_reviews.title: Motion detector issues
customer_reviews.text: Cannot disable motion detector. Customer service is a joke as I haven't heard back from them in over two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Roa

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet
customer_reviews.text: It's so quiet that when I turned it on, I didnt hear anything and thought I forgot to turn the breaker back on. It was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this one. The exhaust pipe is louder than the fan. Which exhaust is quiet?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This fan is so quiet. The best feature is that it turns on automatically when you are in the room. It's perfect for smaller bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: CindyD

customer_reviews.title: Motion detecting & Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great exhaust fan. Super quiet. Adjustable speed (CFM) and timing. Have it set to stay on for 10 minutes after motion is no longer detected. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Saffer

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on its promises!
customer_reviews.text: You really can’t hear it! Looks beautiful. Has a bright light and a low light. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: LeslieDi

customer_reviews.title: worry free operation
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat quiet. Comes on when it detects you and shuts off when absent. My concern was it was going to continue to run as I wired direct without the switch. It did just what it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This fan never shuts off
customer_reviews.text: This fan never shuts off. I've read the instructions, opened it up, changed the settings as instructed. I still can't get it to shut off. Its not the loudest fan ever, but when it runs into the night yes it is very annoying. Luckily the electrical sub panel is right outside the bathroom and now I use the switch on the sub panel to shut off the fan and the lights in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hughes

product_meta.title: Panasonic FV-0511VQC1 WhisperSense Ventilation Fan with Motion and Humidity Sensors, Pick-A-Flow Speed Selector, Extremely Quiet, Long Lasting, Easy to Install, Energy Star Certified, White
product_meta.description: Style:FanWhisperSense DC Precision Spot Ventilation fan with built-in Dual Sensor Technology (Motion and Moisture) for automatic moisture and odor control. Features Pick-A-Flow speed selector switch to select required airflow (50-80-110 CFM) and ECM Motor with SmartFlow technology for optimum performance. Can be used to comply with the latest codes and standards. Precision spot ventilation fans ideal for use in the bathroom, laundry room, mud room, basement or garage. Pick-A-Flow Speed Selector (50-80-110 CFM) combined with SmartFlow Technology simplifies the selection process and ensures optimum performance to meet code and reduce call-backs. Revolutionary ECM motor with SmartFlow technology for optimum CFM output. Dual Sensor Technology (motion and moisture) provides built-in redundancy for the ultimate in automatic moisture and odor control. Flex-Z Fast bracket provides flexible, fast and trouble-free installation, even from below the ceiling. Elegant grille design compliments the aesthetics of any room. Can be used to comply with ASHRAE 62. 2, LEED, ENERGY STAR IAP, CALGreen, Earth Craft, CA Title 24 and WA state code. 6-year ECM motor, 5-years LED, 3-years parts.
feature_bullets: QUIET, CLEAN AIR: At less than .3 sones, this fan operates as quiet as a whisper as it improves indoor air quality by eliminating humidity, mold, mildew, and other air pollutants from any room.

LONG LIFE, GUARANTEED: Panasonic ventilation fans use less energy to move larger volumes of air. Less energy leads to less overheating and motor failure, saving you on repair costs. Included 6-year warranty on motor and 3-year warranty on parts.
EASY-TO-INSTALL: Works with 4" and 6" ducts for flexibility in duct layout and design. Flex-Z Fast installation bracket is ideal for positioning the fan exactly where you want it.
SMART SENSORS: Built-in adjustable motion and humidity sensors with auto shutoff for increased energy efficiency.
CODE COMPLIANT: WhisperSense DC was awarded ENERGY STAR 2018 Most Efficient. The fan also complies with ASHRAE 62.2, LEED, CALGreen, California Title 24, Washington VIAQ codes and standards.

specifications.Included Components: Ventilation Fan unit, grille, Flexi-Fast bracket, intallation manual, warranty sheet, self-drilling screws
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
